channel.title: html on 莫离君的博客
channel.description: Recent content in html on 莫离君的博客

item.title: 各种常见的UI元素
item.description: ##按钮 ####色块按钮 <a class="btn">按钮</a> <style> .btn {background-color: #c2c2c2;color: #fff;border-radius: 3px; border: 1px solid transparent; border-radius: 4px; cursor: pointer; display: inline-block; font-size: 14px; font-weight: 400; line-height: 1.5; margin-bottom: 0; padding: 6px 12px; text-align: center; vertical-align: middle; white-space: nowrap; text-decoration: none; } .btn:active,.btn:hover {background-color:#bababa; border-color:#bababa;} </style> ####线框按钮 <a class="btn">按钮</a> <style> .btn {color: #c2c2c2;border-radius: 3px; border: 1px solid #c2c2c2; border-radius: 4px; cursor: pointer; display: inline-block; font-size: 14px; font-weight: 400; line-height: 1.5; margin-bottom: 0; padding: 6px 12px; text-align: center; vertical-align: middle; white-space: nowrap; text-decoration: none; } .
